history.proof: hauto depth: 6 lq: on use: Zp_mult_one, Zp_invert_eq_not_zero, Zp_invert_opp.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0%nat Hp' : prime p Hp'' : (2 <= p)%nat Hzero_one : Zp <> Op Unable to unify "∸ Op ⊗ ?M1460 = ∸ ?M1460" with "Op = exist (fun x : nat => (x < p)%nat) (rem (p - rem 1 p) p) (div_rem_spec2 (p - rem 1 p) Hp) ⊗ exist (fun x : nat => (x < p)%nat) (rem (p - rem 1 p) p) (div_rem_spec2 (p - rem 1 p) Hp)".

In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0%nat Hp' : prime p Hp'' : (2 <= p)%nat Hzero_one : Zp <> Op Unable to unify "Zp <> Op" with "Op = exist (fun x : nat => (x < p)%nat) (rem (p - rem 1 p) p) (div_rem_spec2 (p - rem 1 p) Hp) ⊗ exist (fun x : nat => (x < p)%nat) (rem (p - rem 1 p) p) (div_rem_spec2 (p - rem 1 p) Hp)".

original: simpl. rewrite Zp_invert_eq_not_zero. symmetry. apply Zp_mult_minus_one. apply Hzero_one.
